The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses viz., Bachelor of Dental Surgery (BDS) and Master of Dental Surgery (MDS). Admissions to the BDS is based on the marks secured in NEET UG entrance exam and for MDS, applicants must have a BDS degree and qualifying marks in NEET PG.

The college is officially recognized by MCI/Government of India and is affiliated to Dr. NTR University Of Health Sciences, Vijayawada. The institute offers a variety of undergraduate and postgraduate courses i.e. MBBS, MD, and MS. The MBBS program is a 4 and a half year long full-time course. It includes a 1-year-long internship. The MD/MS courses are 3 years long and have 19 specializations in total.

College_Name: Hindu College of Pharmacy, Guntur
College_Summary: Hindu College of Pharmacy located in Guntur, Andhra Pradesh was established in the year 1999 under the leadership of Dr. Murthy. The vision of the college is to help the students gain appropriate knowledge of their fields through scientific and modern methodologies. It has been the continuous and generous effort of the entire institution to impart fruitful training and knowledge relating to Pharmacy, and its research. The Hindu College of Pharmacy believes in serving the society and thus helps students from the backward classes to achieve academic qualification and excellence. The mission of the institution is to develop individuals who excel in their work fields along with having a responsible attitude towards the society.

They are aiming to develop a model manufacturing unit within the campus. As an institution, they are aiming at establishing a drug and pharmaceutical research center that will help and encourage students in taking interest and working towards the betterment of the society with their knowledge in the field. They are working towards achieving the position of top colleges in the world pharmaceutical industry.

Seven Hills College of Pharmacy - [SHCP], Tirupati
College_Summary: The Seven Hills College of Pharmacy, Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh has been the torch bearer in the pharmaceutical training sector in India. The college has an unstained reputation of serving quality education in the field of pharmacy and enabling the students to be forerunners when it comes to catering the needs of the society. With the microbial world changing its form, every second and the anti-human forces getting fiercer and fiercer, the subsequent increase in consumption of drugs has propelled the scope and need of this branch of science. The budding hospitals, nursing homes and research centres that have or are planning to scale the India map have further increased the demand of pharmaceutical being. The college uses all the modern amenities to train its students to deal with the adversities in the health care world and come up with fruitful solutions time and again. Research and development being an important part of pharmacy, has been a sought after field in the college, as students and teachers engage themselves in endless hours of analyzing and extracting information about the trends of microbial activities. The efficient and experienced faculty is always ready to be an asset to the cause of the students.

The Institute is dedicated to preparing the students for real life challenges and demands by rigorous academic endeavors and faith-based approach.From the very beginning, the Institute has followed the path of all-round glory and success. The Institute promotes researched training and facilitates in-depth learning process through clinical and laboratory experience.  The institute also provides access to best Knowledge resource through high-speed internet and library facilities and permitting stimulating research projects and by out-sourcing well-known industry faculty. All this features makes the institution a finest training ground for young aspirants.Teaching and learning process is outstanding. There is a splendid interactive relationship between teachers & students. In every year, students participate in various curricular & extra curricular activities in National level also.

The college offers a 2-year full time flagship MBA program and annual intake is 180 students for this program. The Business School also offers BBA + MBA, EMBA, MDP, Certificate courses and PhD degree in Finance, Economics and Management. Andhra University
College_Summary: Andhra University (AU) is one of the oldest educational institutions in the country. It is also the first to be conceived as a residential and teaching-cum-affiliating University. The University Presently is Offering 313 Courses in Arts, Commerce, Management, Science & Technology, Engineering, Law, Pharmacy, and Education. The University has five constituent colleges and four AU Campuses. Presently, the University was ranked 43rd in the University category as per NIRF 2023 ranking. Andhra University has been accredited with an ‘A’ grade by NAAC. Also, the University’s School of Distance Education offers Courses ranging from Certificate Courses to Post Graduate and Professional Courses. Check: Andhra University Distance Education

College_Name: DSNLU
College_Summary: Damodaram Sanjivayya National Law University (DSNLU) was established in the year 2008 and is the 15th participating university in CLAT-2015. It offers courses such as B.A LLB, LLM, Ph.D. Admission to these courses is done on the basis of the entrance exam that is CLAT. The application process can be done online. The average salary package at the university ranges from INR 3 - 4 LPA.

Ambedkar University, Srikakulam has been established by Andhra Pradesh State Government G.O vide MS No: 89 Higher Education (UE.II) Department dated 25/06/2008, with a view to augment the education facilities in the Srikakulam District and to cater to the educational needs of the people of the district.

College_Name: YSRUHS
College_Summary: Dr. NTR University of Health Sciences (NTRUHS) is a state university in Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh. NTRUHS was established in 1986 and is named for Dr Nandamuri Taraka Rama Rao, a former chief minister of the state of Andhra Pradesh. The Government of Andhra Pradesh renamed Dr NTR University of Health Sciences as “Dr YSR University of Health Sciences”. This state university has received recognition from several statutory authorities, including the Indian Nursing Council (INC), Central Council of Homeopathy (CCH), Central Council of Indian Medicine (CCIM), and Medical Council of India (MCI).

College_Name: Dravidian University
College_Summary: Dravidian University has been accredited with a B grade from NAAC and is recognized by the UGC. There are 30 academic departments and four centers within the university. It's a public university and was established in the year 1997.

College_Summary: Jawaharlal Nehru Technological University, Kakinada is a public university. This university at the time of its establishment in 1946 was known as The College of Engineering, Vizagapatnam. University College of Engineering, Kakinada was ranked 317 among universities by the National Institutional Ranking Framework (NIRF) in 2019. JNTUK has three constituent colleges:

College_Name: Krishna University
College_Summary: Krishna University was established in 2008 in the Machilipatnam district of Andra Pradesh by the government of Andra Pradesh. It is affiliated to the UGC and a member of the AIU (Association of Indian Universities). It offers 22 courses in 70+ specializations. At the UG level, it offers Bachelor's degrees in 11 courses including engineering, law, science, commerce, pharmacy, etc, with more than 40 departments to choose from. For Post Graduation it offers degrees in science, business, education, etc, and Ph.D with a total of 30+ different specializations across all courses.

College_Name: National Sanskrit University Tirupati
Sri Krishnadevaraya University
College_Summary: Sri Krishnadevaraya University, Ananthapur laid its foundation as a Postgraduate Centre of Sri Venkateswara University in the year 1967. However, with due course of time, i.e. in 1981 the Postgraduate Centre attained the status of a University. Starting with just 5 departments during its inception, the University has now come up with a total of 5 on-campus colleges:

College_Name: SSSIHL
College_Summary: Sri Sathya Sai Institute of Higher Learning (SSSIHL) deemed to be University, is a unique institution that is a pioneer in providing Educare - a system of education that blends secular knowledge with spiritual knowledge. It was founded by Sri Sathya Sai Baba in 1981. The institute has been approved by UGC and AICTE. The NAAC Accreditation for the university is A++. Apart from the campus for women in Anantapur, there are three more campuses for men. The institute offers courses under both UG and PG domain. Apply here for SSSIHL Admission

College_Name: Sri Venkateswara Vedic University, Tirupati
College_Summary: Sri Venkateswara Vedic University was started in the year 2006 under the efforts of Shri Rameshwar Thakurji. University aims that research and publication department can significantly contribute and bring out such works that serve in the need. University has 147.65 acres of land in Tirupati. University is recongnosed by UGC.

College_Name: Vikrama Simhapuri University (VSU)
College_Summary: Vikrama Simhapuri University (VSU) is a public state university that offers PG, Integrated M.Sc and Ph.D. courses in various specializations under its three constituent colleges. Some of the courses are MA, M.Sc, M.Com, M.Ed, M.P.Ed, MSW, Integrated M.Sc, MBA, BFA and Diploma, and lastly, Ph.D. courses.

College_Name: Yogi Vemana University (YVU)
College_Summary: Yogi Vemana University namely YVU came into existence on March 9, 2006. The university is located 15 km away from Kadapa city. The university is committed to nourish and uphold healthy educational standards which provide to the social, intellectual and ethical development of the students. It provides Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Ph.D. programs such as B.Com, B.Sc., MA, BFA and more. Yogi Vemana University admissions in Postgraduate programs are done on the basis of merit in YVUCET and for Ph.D. the eligibility criteria vary from specialization to specialization.

College_Name: ANUCDE
College_Summary: Acharya Nagarjuna University Centre for Distance (ANUCDE) Education is a substituent college of Acharya Nagarjuna University. Established in 2003, ANU CDE is one of the country's best Open and Distance Learning (ODL) institutes. It is recognized by the UGC-DEB and accredited by the NAAC with an ‘A’ grade. ANU CDE currently offers 31 courses at the UG, PG, Diploma, and Certificate levels through Open and Distance Learning modes through 197 Learner Support Centres (LSCs). ANUCDE admissions are done twice a year i.e., Jan-March and July-September.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Library and Information Science [B.Lib.I.Sc]

College_Name: Dravidian University DDE
College_Summary: Directorate of Distance Education, Dravidian University was founded in 2008 at Chittor District of Andhra Pradesh to provide quality education in distance mode. It offers a plethora of UG, PG, and PG Diploma courses in various disciplines. DDE offers B.A, B.Com, BBA, BCA, B.Lib, and B.Sc. at the UG level, and at the PG level, it offers M.A, MCA, M.Com, M.Sc., MBA, M.Lib, and PG Diploma courses. Admissions to all these courses are based on the performance of the students in the qualifying examinations. Application forms can be filled in through offline mode.

College_Name: SVUDDE Tirupati
College_Summary: Sri Venkateswara University Directorate of Distance Education was introduced in April 1995 with an objective to provide higher educational opportunities to the people who were deprived of the same earlier. It was initiated by Sri Venkateswara University, Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh and is affiliated to the same. The institute offers 5 courses at UG level, namely B.A., B.Sc., B.Com, B.Ed, Bachelor of Library & Information Science and 6 courses at PG level, namely M.A., MBA, Master of Social Work, M.Com, Master of Library & Information Science, M.Sc. in various specializations through correspondence. The institute also offers PG Diploma courses. The admissions here are sought through the merit of marks secured by a candidate in the qualifying exam.

College_Name: College of Veterinary Science, Tirupati
College_Summary: College of Veterinary Sciences is a government college established in 1955. The college is situated in Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh and was inaugurated by former Chief Minister of Andhra Pradesh, Shri B. Gopala Reddy. The college has received approval from the University Grants Commission (UGC) and is affiliated with Sri Venkateswara Veterinary University (SVUU) Tirupati

College_Name: N.T.R. College of Veterinary Science, Gangavaram
College_Summary: NTR College of Veterinary Sciences is a government-owned Institute, founded in 1997, is one of the reputed Government veterinary colleges in Andhra Pradesh. The Institute has also been affiliated to Sri Venkateswara Veterinary University, Tirupati.

College_Name: College Of Veterinary Science - [COVS], Kadapa
College_Summary: College of Veterinary Sciences was established in the year 2008 to provide undergraduate courses in the field of veterinary science. Situated in Proddatur, Kadapa in Andhra Pradesh, it is a part of the Sri Venkateswara Veterinary University, Tirupati as a constituent college.

College_Name: Integral Institute of Advanced Management
College_Summary: Integral Institute of Advanced Management (IIAM) is a well-known B-School in India, imparts programs in the management domain. The college is affiliated to the Sri Venkateswara University, approved by AICTE, & recognized by Govt. of Andhra Pradesh. It offers undergraduate courses in the field of commerce, business administration, and science which are comprehensive in quality education. The college has highly-experienced faculties with rich corporate and academic experience. More than 8000 students have completed their degrees from the college and are having promising careers in various sectors.

College_Summary: Andhra Medical College, Visakhapatnam, established in 1923 is the oldest medical college in the state of Andhra Pradesh. The College is affiliated to the Dr. NTR University of Health Sciences, Vijayawada and is recognized by the Medical Council of India.

College_Name: St. Joseph's College for Women, Visakhapatnam
Saveetha Amaravati University, Vijayawada
College_Summary: The Saveetha Amaravati University was established in the year 2017. The University offers courses like BPT, BOT, and BSC. The criterion for admissions to Saveetha Amaravati University in different courses is based on merit.

College_Name: ACSR Government Medical College, Nellore
College_Summary: ACSR Government Medical College Nellore is a prestigious medical college established in the year 2014. It is affiliated to Dr NTR University of Health Sciences, Vijayawada, recognized by MCI and accredited by NAAC with an A grade. The college offers MBBS at the Undergraduate level and MD, MS at the post-graduate level under an experienced team of faculty members. Admissions are granted on the basis of NEET scores. Spreading over an area of 67.5 acres, the campus boasts of good infrastructural facilities to create an excellent learning environment.

College_Name: Sun International Institute For Tourism & Management- (SIITAM), Visakhapatnam
College_Summary: Sun International Institute for Tourism and Management,`various courses BBA, B.Sc, BHM at UG level and MBA at PG level across various specializations. Admission to all the courses are based on candidates' previous year qualifying examination. Final selection is based on the Personal Interview round held at the counseling. The training and placement cell at SIITM aims at providing 100% placement assistance to its students. Some of the top recruiters that recruit SIITM students include Google, Accenture, Royal Orchid, Le Meridien among various others.

College_Name: Sri Padmavathi Medical College for Women
College_Summary: Sri Padmavathi Medical College for Women was founded in 2014 in Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh. It is India’s second government medical college established exclusively for female students. The college is affiliated to Sri Venkateswara Institute of Medical Sciences. It offers an MBBS course. Admissions to the college is conducted on the basis of the NEET entrance examination.

Imperial College of Hotel Management & Tourism, Visakhapatnam
College_Summary: Imperial College of Hotel Management & Tourism, Visakhapatnam was established in 2012. The college is approved by UGC and AICTE. At UG level, it offers courses such as Diploma, B.Sc, and BBA. While at PG level, it offers PG Diploma, Post Diploma and MBA. Admission to all the courses are based on merit. Candidates can fill the application in offline mode.

College_Name: Southern International Hotel Management Academy (SIHMA), Visakhapatnam
College_Summary: Southern International Hotel Management Academy (SIHMA), Visakhapatnam is recognized nationally as a premier institution in Management Education, Training and Consultancy. It is affiliated to Andhra University and approved by the Government of Andhra Pradesh in the year 2015. The institute offers undergraduate courses in the discipline of Hotel Management and Science. Admission to SIHMA depends on the performance of the candidates in the previous qualifying examination.

College_Name: GIET Degree College - [GIET], East Godavari
College_Summary: GIET Degree College is a Science, Commerce, and Management college offering Undergraduate courses such as BBA, B.Com, and B.Sc in various specializations. The college admits students based on marks obtained in GIETCET by the student. Candidate can apply for the application process online through the official website. To appear for the GIET CET, the applicant must have scored 50% aggregate marks in the relevant field.

College_Name: AIIMS Mangalagiri
College_Summary: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Mangalagiri is a medical research and higher education institute. The institute is located in Guntur district, Andhra Pradesh, India was established in 2018. AIIMS Mangalagiri is one of the AIIMS in India, established under Phase-IV of the Pradhan Mantri Swasthya Suraksha Yojana (PMSSY) initiative. The MHFW Government of India recognises the institute and is approved by the Medical Council of India (MCI). AIIMS Mangalagiri currently offers UG courses such as B.Sc Nursing and MBBS and PG courses such as MD/MS in various specializations based on merit in the entrance examination.

College_Name: Dr Ambedkar Global Law Institute, Tirupati
College_Summary: Dr. Ambedkar Global Law Institute, Tirupati was founded in 1991 and is a highly-ranked institution of law studies in Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh. The institute offers both undergraduate and postgraduate programs along with integrated programs in the law domain.

College_Name: D.N.R. College of Law, Bhimavaram
College_Summary: D.N.R. Law College established on 4th July 1945, by freedom fighter Sri Dantuluri Narayana Raju, is located in Andhra Pradesh. The college conducts 2 courses. BA LLB and LLB which are undergraduate courses. The admission for the courses occurs by AP LAW CET/ CLAT which is conducted every year. Interested and eligible students have to apply online in order to get admission. Students who have completed 12+2+3 with a minimum 45% can apply for admission in the college.

College_Name: Dr. Abdul Haq Urdu University -[AHUU], Kurnool
College_Summary: Dr. Abdul Haq Urdu University (AHUU), Kurnool, is a State University which was established in the recent year 2016. It is a premier Urdu University situated in the Kurnool city of Andhra Pradesh state. The University has been established by an Act of State Legislature Government of Andhra Pradesh (Act No. 13 of 2016) and duly recognized by the UGC. The State Government has allocated 144 Acres of land for the permanent site of the Dr. Abdul Haq Urdu University at Orvakal on Kurnool – Nandyal highway (NH-40). The university offers various courses at Undergraduate, Integrated, and Postgraduate level apart from BA and MA in the Urdu language.

College_Name: GEMS B School Tirupati
College_Summary: GEMS B School, Tirupati is awarded the “Most Preferred B School for Placements” 2020 by ASSOCHAM. It is one of the renowned and sought after institutes for Management. Students have been successfully placed in well known companies such as Cisco, Yahoo, Oracle, ICICI Bank, Hinduja, TATA, HDFC Bank, HSBC Bank, Dell etc. The college offers 11 different MBA courses, an International MBA program in London and UG courses under various disciplines. Admission is done on the basis of marks obtained in the entrance test conducted by the institute.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Business Administration [BBA] + Master of Business Administration [MBA]
Master of Business Administration [MBA] + Post Graduate Program in Business Analytics

College_Name: Samana College of Design Studies - [SCDS], Vijayawada
College_Summary: Located in Vijayawada, Andhra Pradesh, this Samana College of Design Studies is one of the most reputed Design and photography colleges in the entire state, rather in the country. It has been building the career of thousands of students since the time of its establishment in the year of 2010. Students can attain several shows and events inside the college.

College_Name: Central University of Andhra Pradesh (CUAP)
College_Summary: Central University of Andhra Pradesh (CUAP) is government university located in the Anantapur district, Andhra Pradesh. Established in 2018, the university is currently under the mentorship of University of Hyderabad (UoH). Central University of Andhra Pradesh (CUAP) is currently operating from its transit campus is JNTU and the permanent campus is being constructed of over 491.30 acres of land in Janthaluru village, Anantapur district.

Courses_Details.Course Rating: 1 Reviews

College_Name: Andhra University Campus, Tadepalligudem, Tadepalligudem
College_Summary: Andhra University Campus Tadepalligudem was established in 2004. The university offers four courses MBA, MA (English), MCA, M.Ed. Admissions to all courses will be based on the performance of the candidate in the entrance exam AUCET followed by the counselling organized by the community. The application mode is online.
